Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: My girl loved her food, but I really didnâ€™t like mine. I ordered the pork sandwich. The taste was fine, but there were only two small pieces of pork on the sandwich. It was mostly just pork fat and two pieces of potato. I donâ€™t mind some fat on my pork but this was excessive.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text:
Great food, attention and location!

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Cosy little spot in the heart of the city. Nice seating on the outside as well. Had the fish sandwich and it was really nice, so if you are in that area, swing by

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Nice snack lunch here today. Friendly service. Others had bigger very tasty looking dishes. Weâ€™ll come back to check those out.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Peruvian food made by Peruvian. The owner and the staff of the place are very kind and friendly. Good portions, we order lomo saltado and taste was perfect. Prices affordable for two people. â€¦

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: So yummy!! I wanted to go back the next day! Nice home made delicious Peruvian food and pisco sour!

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: The food was great, ambiance as well, location is easy to find too. What could be improved was to have more staff, as there was only one waiter and he did his best and was very friendly, but one person doesnâ€™t seem enough when the place is full. Would definitely come here again as overall it was a very good experience.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: The food was good, no complaining at all but some parts of the service were bad. I ordered a starter and a main meal. Starter came after 45 minutes. After it was finished the staff told me the it's not possible to prepare the main meal and â€¦

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Peruvian cuisine is delicious. This place is a little pricey, but worth it. We had 3 plates and all of them were perfect. The drinks were very good as well. I would highly recommend this place

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: We grabbed a terrific soy cappuccino and hot chocolate. The girl that served us was very nice and helpful. It felt like being at home. Such a small lovely place in the very heart of amsterdam. I wanted hot chocolate as well but since i am vegan there was no option for me. I hope they will make it as an option for future customers.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: A very lovely restaurant with excellent food. The quality is REALLY GOOD!!!! It's located in an old renovated building and they have good service. The coffee is also very, very nice ğŸ˜

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: delicious food but it would be 100% nice if the service staff spoke Spanish since it is a Latin food restaurant.  point to note

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: 1 co-worker from Hengelo insisted we do this Peruvian restaurant Casa Peru and I can tell you that I'm glad we did. The food tasted soooo delicious that I I'm definitely taking my family for a bite of Peruvian delight very soon. â€¦

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: The food is amazing. Really fresh and tasty. They offer some special drinks such as inÄa cola and lemonade made from purple corn. The ting I liked the most was tres leches cake.

Review Text: Ahhhhhmazzzzinggggg!!!! The food is so fresh and delicious!! Nice atmosphere. So so delicious!!!

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: As a Peruvian native I can vouche for this place. It's nicely located and the ambient is right. You won't fine the more traditional Peruvian dishes but rather a more accessible version of them with local ingredients but they still manage to keep the essential flavor of the dish. The bar is also good.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Nice little coffee shop with fairly cheap coffee and seats right by the waterway, so you can watch all the boats! Doesn't do "proper" iced coffee though, just a cappuccino with an ice cube or two, but the coffee was smooth and the waitress was friendly.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: They took like an hour to get my order ready and it is pricy

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: This restaurant is a bit expensive, even by Amsterdam standards. And the price is not reflected in the portion sizes. Unfortunately for us we ordered a starter of ceviche, which costs even more than some of the mains on the menu, and the â€¦

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: ...as always tasty! love peruvian food!

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Service is a bit slow but tasty and good ambiance

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: First time I tried Peruvian dishes, so I cannot compare with traditional recipes. Nevertheless, everything I tried was good and tasty. Service kind and efficient. I will surely try again other dishes here. Nice to eat outside in sunny days.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Very quick and not refined. The place is engineered to be a quick catch for tourists knowing it is a one off. â€¦

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: A friendly little Peruvian restaurant with delicious food that will warm your heart and soul. The food is excellent,flavourful and you can feel that it is made with love. It can be a good place for a date or a cozy dinner with friends.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text:
We ordered pumpkin soup and ceviche. The ceviche was good but the soup was cold! That's a pretty basic mistake that I don't expect a decent restaurant to make.
Besides they were a bit understaffed, so the service was slow.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: We will give it another chance in 6 months time, hoping that it was the lack of ingredients with the lockdown that deviated the dishes from the quality and taste, and closeness to Peruvian food it once had.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Love the rustic atmosphere. Weâ€™ll definitely be back

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: I couldn't have had a better introduction to Peruvian food! The Picante de Mariscos was delicious, as was the Lomo Saltado. Add a glass of sangria, and you have a wonderful meal.  Despite being quite busy, our waiter attentive and on top of things.  I would definitely go back.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text:
Possibly the best restaurant I've been in the world. Recommend anyone visiting Amsterdam to try it!
We had seafood rice, shrimps, some starter, can't recall which, and homemade sangria. We were all completely delighted!

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Nice place, good food but not great, pricey. I guve a bad review because of the service it was awful, rude waitress and waiter,  they give us the â€œoptionâ€ to choose between 3 dishes because those come out of the kitchen faster if you choose â€¦

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: The food is amazing, a truly new experience! The ambience is also great, we had dinner at the canal, and the service is very good too. A bit on the expensive side, but it is justified by the quality of ingredients.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text:
We had lomo saltado and ceviche.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: I loved the food. I live here and I wanted to try something different instead of the tipical local specialities. Well, in this restaurant I got it. Unique taste ( from South-America), with friendly waiters around.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Great location with canal view. Annoying waiter telling me a normal beer (to local standards) is a babybeer. Nice try to upsell larger products but gives impression of tourist trap

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: We had a very pleasant first experience of Peruvian cuisine last night ( I wanted to have a try before travelling to Peru in a few months - it's a good mise en bouche . Very tasty indeed. The waiter who attended was very helpful.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Excellent and authentic food, great cocktails and friendly staff. A bit above average priced, but definitely worth a visit.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text:
SO DISAPPOINTING portions, and extremely pricy. it is not even a gastronomic restaurant. According to the carless waiter, they were using bigger plate which probably was making the portion look smaller ... hahaha such a bad excuse!!!

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: I love this place. The food is amazing, the place is cozy and during the summer, a beautiful terrasse is set up in front of the restaurant, next to the Canal! Highly recommended :)

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: Beautiful location. I had the ceviche, which was really delicious and I'm glad I tried it, but i was a bit disappointed it wasn't a full meal for the price. Add some bread and it would have been a meal.

Review Text: Poor service and subpar food. We had the ceviche and the lomo saltado. the ceviche was OK but the lomo saltado was quite terrible. There was a hair on my food and our waitress was barely apologetic, did not remove it or offer to replace my food.

Name: Casa Peru
Review Text: The food is delicious. The presentation is awesome. However the price of the ceviche was too high in comparison with the amount you see on the plate.
